item.title: Om (next) Tutorial Code
item.description: Seems to be a good Om (next) tutorial. As soon as I read it I will update this doc.

item.title: React Four Ways: How to Use React in ClojureScript, and Why
item.description: This article contains a comparison between four ClojureScript frameworks on top of React. The frameworks might be outdated but they may be a reference of different point-of-views of using React in ClojureScript.
